game.name: Shuri-Ken
game.desc:
Description: Ken the ninja must fight off waves of enemy stars. Each wave is stronger than the last, but Ken gets stronger over time too.
Controls: * X - throw shuriken * Z - jump * Left Arrow Key / Right Arrow Key - move * Up Arrow Key / Down Arrow Key - throw shuriken upward / downward, when throwing shuriken with X * P - pause (allows resetting after death)
